name: RavagerBot
description: A bot that sails the high seas and brings treasures from the land unknown

CLIENT_CONFIG.description: Google API client secret (Paste the client_secret.json)

STATE_SECRET_KEY.description: Secret key for generating state secret for oauth

HEROKU_API_TOKEN.description: (Optional,Recommended) Heroku api token for getting dyno expiry time and for restarting dynos

KEEP_HEROKU_ALIVE.description: (Optional,Recommended) Should ravager ping itself in free dynos to prevent auto-shutdown

ALLOWLIST.description: (Optional,Recommended) Should there be a filter and passwords required for accessing the bot in a group or private chat?

GROUP_PASSWORD.description: (Optional,Recommended) Password required for accessing and using the bot in a group chat

USER_PASSWORD.description: (Optional,Recommended) Password required for accessing and using the bot in a private chat
